term.title: nanofiltration

item.text: Pressure-driven membrane-based separation process in which particles and dissolved macromolecules smaller than 2 nm are rejected.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 1479. 'Terminology for membranes and membrane processes (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 1487 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668071479)
